des:
Voice control of home appliances and scenes set in the HOME ASSIST app

▼List of devices that can be operated
・AC (power on/off, mode change, air volume, swing)
・TV (power on/off, channel change, volume change, mute, input switching, AV control)
・Ceiling light (power on/off, brightness adjustment)
・Smart light (power on/off, brightness adjustment, color change)
・Scene execution

Click here to learn how to speak.
https://www.livesmart.co.jp/home-assist/guide-alexa

▼How to set skills
To enable the HOME ASSIST Smart Home skill, you need to: 
1. download the HOME ASSIST app and complete the settings for each device.
2. in the Alexa app, select "Enable Skill" for the HOME ASSIST Smart Home skill
3. Link your account and enter the account and password you registered in the HOME ASSIST app.
4. From the Alexa app, tap "Smart Home" → "Devices" → "Add Device" to discover the device. Alternatively, you can say to Alexa, "Find my device".
5. talk to Alexa and enjoy your smart life!

If you have any questions, please check our Help & Support page.
https://support-home-assist.livesmart.co.jp/hc/ja
